img.alt: Professional Learning Communities at Work Logo

nav.class: main-navigation dropdown d-block d-lg-none mx-auto mx-md-3

div.h3: Our mission is to enrich, empower and enhance our students’ lives through education.

div.class: dashboard-1 card col-12 col-lg px-0 mb-5

div.p: The Business Services Department supports student learning by providing efficient financial services and ensuring sound fiscal management for the district.

div.class: dashboard-2 card col-12 col-lg px-0 mb-5

div.p: Our priority is to improve Palo Verde Unified School District schools. We provide tools, best practices and interventions to support strategic work and instructional leadership.

div.class: dashboard-3 card col-12 col-lg px-0 mb-5

div.p: We provide nutritious meals to enhance learning and establish positive lifelong eating habits. We serve an average of 2500 lunches and 1000 breakfasts daily.
